result.name: annual-returns-for-research-involving-human-embryos
result.notes: Annual return of data from centres who have research projects that involve the use of human embryos

organization.name: human-fertilisation-and-embryology-authority
organization.title: Human Fertilisation and Embryology Authority
organization.description:
The Human Fertilisation and Embryology Authority (HEFA) oversees the use of gametes and embryos in fertility treatment and research. It licenses fertility clinics and centres carrying out in vitro fertilisation (IVF), other assisted conception procedures and human embryo research.

HFEA is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department of Health

http://www.hfea.gov.uk/

result.title: Annual returns for research involving human embryos

extras.value: Not to be published in raw form - sensitve subject matter.
